thread.section_title: Comedy Driving, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Comedy Driving, Inc. | comedydriving.com
thread.title: Jen Lynch Paterson
thread.title_full: Comedy Driving, Inc. reviewed by Jen Lynch Paterson

author: Jen Lynch Paterson
title: Jen Lynch Paterson
text:
This course had the perfect balance of comedy and seriousness. The videos chosen for the course were heavy enough to make me think about my driving habits, and change my behavior.
The comedy was cheesy enough to make the time go by quickly. I especially loved the counter feature. It helped me keep track of my time.
